title: FS: T206 Cobb bat off (Tolstoi bk)
author: Aaron Seefeldt

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Cobb bat off (Tolstoi bk)
posts.post_content:
PSA 2. Strong colors, well centered, clean card with vibrant colors and a clear image.  Corners are slightly rounded. No creases. The back has 2 spots of paper loss, most noticeable where the "B" in SUBJECTS is missing. 

Tough front/back combo, much scarcer than Red port/tolstoi combo.

No paypal, I'm old school. Checks or money orders.  $2600

email:  [url]seefeldtaaron@gmail.com[/url]
